response.original_title: Kanna はじらいの重力・三木環奈
response.overview: The star of this film is Kanna Miki! She is a glamorous beauty with long, lustrous hair and a J-cup bust! Her hobbies are watching videos, and she likes idols and dramas, but she is a shy and modest Japanese woman who says she doesn't have any special skills. Kanna has a quiet personality, but her favorite class is PE and she is secretly active, and she is good at soccer. When the filming begins, she shows a lot of dynamism! This is her second time doing an image shoot, and Kanna herself feels that she has grown, as she was able to make spontaneous movements that were difficult to do last time. She asks you to pay attention to the jump rope scene.
response.tagline: You will be drawn to her shy and swaying maiden heart!!
response.title: Kanna Gravity of Shyness
